title: Acne - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Acne
As per Ayurveda , or main reason for pure break out in he debiliation of Agni which prompts imbalance of all he 3 doshas , cheifly the Pitta dohsa , which further impedes the blood and fat tissues.
Symptoms
Pimples o face , chest or back
Black heads
White heads or pustules
Red and swollen pimples with visible pus.
Painful to bunch pimples.
Treatments
To treat the root cause of Acne, an individual is suggested a pitta-conciliating diet. The individuals who see continuous out breaks of acne, should stay away from oily, spicy sour and terminated goods.
Internal medications for pacifying ptta and ama.
Diet and lifestyle.
Therapeutic treatments like lepanam , swedanam etc.

title: Fibroid Uterus - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Fibroid Uterus
Uterine fibroids can be related to the ‘Granthi’ mentioned in ayurvedic tests . vata dosha is the Predominant pathological factor being the natural site of its location (Basti pradesha) in the body.
Symptoms
Heavy Menstrual bleeding
Prolonged periods , spotting , dysmenorrhea
Pelvic pain , abdominal pain or lower pain
Abdominal distension or cramping
Weight gain
Treatments
Vata-kapha shamaka line of treatment
Internal medications
Yoga therapy and exercises
Therapeutic treatments

title: Calcaneal Spur - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Calcaneal Spur
These Spurs typically form due to repeated stress or pressure on the foot, resulting in the accumulation of calcium on the heel bone.
Ayurveda attributes calcaneal spurs to an imbalance in the vata and kapha doshas. Factors like poor digestion, improper foot wear , excessive walking , and obesity are believed to exacerbate these doshas , culminating in the formation of spurs
Symptoms
Persistent heel pain.
Inflammation at the bottom of the heel
Pain when walking or excercising with out supportive shoes
Feeling of a small , bony bump on the bottom or back of your heel
Treatments
Internal medications to alleviate vata and kapha doshes
Strict diet and lifestyle
Excercises and yoga therapy.
Therapeutic treatments like lepanam , dhara , abhyangam , bandaging , swedanam etc.

title: Hair Loss - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Hair Loss
Reasons
Drug side effects
Symptom of a medical illness
Fungal infection of the scalp
Hereditary pattern baldness
Alopeccia etc.
Symptoms
Gradual thinning on top of head:- This is the most common type of hairloss affecting the people as they age
Circular or patchy bald spots
sudden loosening of hair: due to physical or emotional shock
Full body hair loss: due to medical treatments such as Chemotherapy.
Patches of scaling that spread over the scalp due to ringworm
Treatments
The common causes of hair loss are lack of nutrients that are essential in the body , an excess of chemicals applield to your hair, unhealthy diet hormonal imbalance , dandruff or other scalp disorders , excess of stress etc.
Internal medications according to the conditions
Diet and hair care
Therapeutic treatments like dhara , oil massage , swedanam , mask etc

title: Constipation - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Constipation
Physical inactivity or medication side effects .According to Ayurveda he constipation is due to the imbalance in the vata dosha , which centers in the colon.
Symptoms
Fewer than three stools a week
Hard , dry or lumpy stools
Straining or pain when passing stools
A feeling of incomlete evacuation of stools
A feeling that the rectum is blocked
Treatments
Internal medications with ayurvedic formulations
Yoga therapy
Therapeutic treatments

title: Dandruff - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Dandruff
These dosha imbalances lend to toxin accumulation in the deep tissues of the scalp, resulting in dandruff and itchy scalp.
Symptoms
Skin flakes on your scalp, hair eyebrows , beard or mustache and shoulders
Itchy scalp
Scalp , crusty scalp in infants
Treatments
Internal medications for allevating the vitiated doshas
Diet
Therapeutic treatments like shirodhara,shirobasti,herbal packs etc.

title: Dysmenorrhoea - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Dysmenorrhoea
It means painful menstruation. Recurrent cramps during the cycle, tiredness, abdominal clysters, nausea, vomiting pain radiating to thigh and calf from lower back, pelvic ache , muscle soreness etc.
Primary dysmenorrhea is caused by uterine muscle contractions stimulated by prostaglandins uterine fibroids, endometriosis , adenomyosis , polycystic ovarian syndrome , certain IUDs and medications , cancer and pelvic inflammation can lead to secondary dysmenorrhea
Treatments
Ayurveda correlates dysmenorrhea to kashartava kashta meaning difficult and artava meaning menstruation. It is considered as a vata pradhana tridoshaja vyadhi , or a disease that invovles all the three doshas with a predominance in vata. Vata is the main cause of pain, aches and cramps. The obstruction of apana vayu and arthavavaha srotas the main cause kashartava. Ayurveda offers a complete cure for dysmenorrhea through a proper diet, regimen , internal medication and therapies.
Internal medications
Therapeutic treatments
Yoga therapy

title: Diabetes & Related Issues - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Diabetes & Related Issues
Insulin is a hormone that regulates blood glucose . hyperglycemia also called raised blood glucose is a common effect of uncontrolled diabetes and over time leads to serious damage to many of the body system especially the nerves and blood vessels.
Symptoms
Feeling very thirsty
Needing to urinate more often than usual
Blurred Vision
Feeling tired
losing weight unintentionally
Treatments
Overtime , diabetes can damage blood vessels in the heart , eyes , kidneys and nerves.So right treatment at the right time is recommended to manage the condition effectively for a longer period.
Herbal infusions for pacifying the- vitated doshas
Diet
Yoga and Meditation
Therapeutic treatments like abhayanga , dhara , swedana , virechana etc.

title: Gout - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Gout
Gout most commonly affects your big toe joint.But it can affect other jonts , including your knees , Ankles , feet , hands and wrists and elbows . Gout symptoms come and go in episodes called flares or gout attacks.
Symptoms
Intense pain
Discoloration or redness
Stiffness
Swelling
Tenderness , even to a light touch
Warmth or a feeling like the joint is on fire
Treatments
In Ayurveda , Gouty arthritis has similarity to vata pittadhika vataraktha.
Ayurvedic Medications
Yoga therapy
Excercises
Strict diet and lifestyle
Therapeutic treatment like dhara , kizhi , avagaha sweda , lepanam etc.

title: Diarrhea - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Diarrhea
Loose motions is passing of loose and fluid consistency of feces that may or may not be recurrent over a period of time. This fluid consistency sometimes associated with pus or bloody discharge. Diarrhea in Ayurveda is correlated to Atisara . ‘Ati’ means large quantity and ‘Sara’ means fluid consistency.
Symptoms
Bloated tummy
Feeling nausea ( vomiting sensation)
Stomach cramps
May be associated with pus or blood
Loss of weight
Loss of appetite
Feeling uneasy
High temperature
Treatments
According to the dosha ( Vata , pitha and kapha) involvement and the strength of the patient the physician prescribes the treatment
Internal medications with formulations
Pathyas

title: Cholesterol - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Cholesterol
LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels , As well as reduction throughout HDL Cholesterol levels in the blood. According to Ayurveda it is an increase in Medas in the body and is linked to Medo Roga
Symptoms
It is mostly asymptomatic in the case of high blood cholesterol. In some cases people may experiences.
Dizziness
Unsteady gait
Slurred speech
Pain in the lower leg
Treatments
Internal medications
Diet plan
Excercises
Yoga therapy
Therapeutic treatments which helps to reduce medas

title: Piles - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Piles
Symptoms
A stiff, Possibly painful lump may be felt around the anus
It might contain coagulated blood
After clearing the bowels , an individual feels the urge to evacuate or heaviness in the abdomen
Fresh blood is visible after passing stool or along with the stool
Itchiness in the anal region
The anal region becomes red in color and sore in texture
Difficulty and pain in passing if stool insevere conditions
In Severe Conditions
Excessive anal bleeding
Infection
Inability to control bowel movements
Anal fistula
Treatments
Internal Medications with herbal formulations
Kshara prayoga, if needed
Pathyas
Therapeutic treatments

title: Osteoporosis - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Osteoporosis
As per Ayurveda, all the food that you eat converts into different tissues(Dhatus)because of Dhatu agni(Metabolism). When this Asthi Dhatu agni or metabolism does not function very well inspite of taking lots of calcium and vitamins , bones start degenerating and lead to osteoporosis. Besides that , excess vata air)in the body also cause degeneration.
Symptoms
Severe back pain
Loss of height
Spine malformations such as a stooped or hunched posture
Losing an inch or more of your height
Shortness of breath
Treatments
Internal medications for improving dhatu agni
Medicines for normalising vitiated vata
Diet and lifestyle
Therapeutic treatment for nourishing the bones and muscles

title: Osteoarthritis - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Osteoarthritis
Rub together and started degenerating.According to Ayurveda sandhigata vata is the commonest form of vatavyadhi which mainly occurs in old age due to dhatukshaya which leads to limits everyday activities such as walking , dressing , bathing etc.
Symptoms
Pain in a joint
Stiffness
Swelling near a joint
A decreased range of motion
Feeling of less strengthness of the joint
Joint deformity
Creaking or popping sound
Treatments
Internal medications with herbal formulations
Weight Management
Yoga therapy and excercises
Therapeutic treatments like oil massage , nadi swetha , bandaging , kizhi etc.

title: Irregular Periods - SREESURYA AYURVEDA

headings.text: Irregular Periods/ Missed or delayed periods

main_content:
Irregular Periods/ Missed or delayed periods
Post Partum or in perimenopausal period. It is mainly due to estrogen deficit , a lack of lymph , blood or other tissues or a combination of these factor.
Symptoms
Infrequent periods that ocur more than 35 day apart
Heavy Menstrual Periods
Prolonged Menstrual bleeding. Bleeding that exceeds eight days
Treatments
Herbal remedies
Food plan
Yoga therapy
Therapeutic treatments.

title: Psoriasis - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Psoriasis
Psoriasis in Ayurveda is a well-known skin problen as “kithibha” is an immunesystem affliction (auto-immune) that causes plaques, which are irritated or sore patches of thick, red ,dry skin Psoriasis influences any part of the body. The elbows knees and lower back are the ordinarily impacted regions. scalp , nails and palms could also be affected.
Symptoms
Inflammed patches of skin
Plaques on the red patches
Dry skin that might break and bleed
Dry skin that might break and bleed
Itching around patches
Thick / hollowed nails
Swollen joints
Stress-unusual high stress might set off flare up
Heavy alcohol additionaly sets off flare-up
Treatments
Ayurveda explains that impurities in the blood connected with emotional aspects are the reason for the disease. Psoriasis is explained to happen due to the vitation of vata and kapha.
Herbal formulations
Diet
Yoga and Meditation
Therapeutic treatments according to patients condition

title: Spondyloarthritis - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Spondyloarthritis
The axial form affects mostly the pelvic joints and spine. The peripheral form affects the limbs.
Symptoms
Symptoms vary by type of spondyloarthitis .
Pain, stiffness and swelling in the lower back, hips, shoulders, knees, elbows and areas where tendons and ligaments meet bone, especially after long periods of sitting or standing.
Fever
Fatique
Skin rash
Inflamation in eyes or intestines
Treatments
According to ayurveda the involvement of vitiated vata and raktha causes the vatasonita (spondylarthritis)
Ama pacahan(remove toxins by herbal medication and therapies)
Diet and excercises
Improving the quality of life style
Therapeutic treatment like abyanga , swedana , lepana etc.

title: Ulcer - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Ulcer
Ayurvedic attributes peptic ulcers to an excess of pitta dosha, leading to increased acidity in the stomach causing pain and discomfort.
Symptoms
Abdominal pain
Loss of appetite and weight loss
Bloating or feeling full quickly after eating
Heartburn or Acid reflux
Dark or Black stools
Treatments
Ayurveda attributes peptic ulcers to an excess of pitta dosha leading to increased acidity in the stomach. It advocates a pitta pacifying diet with cooling , alkaline foods and avoidance of spicy or hot items. Life style changes like reducing exposure to heat and managing stress are crucial.
Herbal formulations
Pathyas

title: Rheumatoid Arthritis - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Rheumatoid Arthritis
Variety of body systems including the skin , eyes , lungs , heart and blood vessels.It is an autoimmune disorder , occurs when your immune system mistakenly attacks your own bodys tissues. unlike the wear and tear damage of osteoarthritis , rheumatoid arthritis affects the lining of your joints , causing a painful swelling that can eventually result in bone erosion and joint deformity.
Symptoms
Tender , warm ,swollen joints , joint pain that last for six weeks or longer
Joint stiffness that is usually worse in the mornings and after inactivity.
Fatigue , fever and loss of appetite.
Joint pain , tenderness
Small joints(wrists, certain joints in the hands and feet)are typically affected first)
The same joints on both sides of the body are affected.
Treatments
According to Ayurveda ama vata(Rheumatoid arthritis) is a disease in which vitiation of vata dosha and accumulation of ama take place in joint shodhana and shamana treatments are advised in Ayurveda. In Ayurveda , Nidana parivarjana is considered as the first and formost line of management.
Internal medications with herbal formulations
Dietary changes
Yoga , excercise and meditation
Therapeutic treatments

title: Indigestion - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Indigestion
Gastroesophageal reflux disease and other conditions.According to Ayurveda he constipation is due to the imbalance in the vata dosha , which centers in the colon.
Symptoms
Bloating
Discomfort
Feeling too full
Nausea
Gas
Treatments
According to Ayurveda indigestion is known as Ajeerna. It is a result of fasting or Consumption of food before digestion of the earlier intake of food Untimely food habits , heavy or dry food , psychological causes like fear , anger , jealousy etc, suppression of natural urges and excessive intake of water cause indigestion. A reduction in pitta activity with an excessive kapha characterizes the doshic profile of indigestion.
Include internal medications with herbal formulations
Strict advice for healthy food habits
Pathyas

title: Irritable Bowel Syndrome - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Irritable Bowel Syndrome
The condition of IBS is known as “Grahani” in ayurveda according to Ayurveda the Agni , is responsible for breaking down food into energy and nutrition. when digestion is complete , the food passes into the next stage of digestion from the various digestive organs . If the person is not able to digest the food easily , then it implies that his/her digestion is weak or you can say the fire element “Agni” is weak. This weak and improper digestion can lead in the accumulations of toxins and all major symptoms of IBS can be result of these toxins(ama)
Symptoms
Experiencing irregular bowel habits such as alternating diarrhea and constipation , improper digestion and undigested food particles passing in motion. constant urge of motion immediately after meal
Pain in the abdominal area
Bloating and nausea
Sensation of incomplete evacuation with an urge of motion
Heart bum, chest pain and dysphagia
In some cases patient may experiences fatigue , irritability , headache , anxiety , depression and even urologic dysfunction and gynecologic symptoms
Treatments
Internal medications for improving digestive fire (agni)) , shodhana , samana and vatanulomana
Pathyas
Therapeutic treatment

title: Post Menopausal Problems - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Post Menopausal Problems
During this stage , Menopausal symptoms , such as hot flashes get milder or go away. People in post menopause are at increased risk for osteoporosis and heart disease. Medication or healthy life style changes may reduce the risk of these conditions.
Symptoms
Hot flashes and night sweats
Vaginal dryness and sexual discomfort
Depression , mood swings , anxiety , irritability etc
Changes in sex drive
Insomnia
Dry skin
Weight Changes
Hair loss
Urinary incontinence
Treatments
Menpause is a natural phenomenon occurs at the age of 45-55 years. Various hormonal changes takes place in the body during this phase of life; which resilts in development of several signs and symptoms that may disturb the routine activities. During reproductive years , Women are protected by female hormones ie, estrogen and progestr one . with menopuase women ente an estrogen deficit phase in their lives, which accelerates the ageing process resulting into greater vulenerablity to psychosomatic problems. these diminshed hormone levels lead to the various symptoms seen in menopausal phase.
Internal medications accroding to the dosha vitiation
Vata samana and Kapha vardhaka line of treatment
Diet
Yoga and Meditation
Excercise
Rasayana therapy
Therapeutic treatments like snehana, swedhana, shirodhara , vasya , pichu , lepanam etc.

title: Postnatal Care - SREESURYA AYURVEDA

headings.text: Pravasava Raksha at Sree Surya Ayurveda

main_content:
Postnatal Care
The Woman has received through her pregnancy , Labour and birth and take into account the woman’s individual needs and prefrences. We are providing a complete postnatal care for the mothers wellness . it helps the mother to get rid of her labour exhertion, vata dosha , stretch marks , reduce belly and helps in stregthening and cleansing the uterus.
Importance of Prasava Raksha
Ayurveda emphasis on prasava raksha Practice as it rejuvinate the mind and the body of the mother. After the delivery , the vata dosha may get increase more and this leads to backpain ,  abdominal pain , increased anxiety and total inbalance of the body . Specialised care medications and diet can help to reduce the vata dosham and helps the mother to regain her physical and mental health. Prasava Raksha should be practice within the first three months of delivery as it is the time for the mother to retain the Physical , Mental health and induce proper lactation. During this period , the uterus get back to its normal position and all the muscles, tendons and ligaments related to uterus get back its lost strength and elasticity .
Benefits of Postnatal care
Faster healing of uterus and related organs .
Strengthens and nourishes joints, muscles and tissues.
Improves the quantity of breast milk.
Cleanses the uterus.
Reduce back pain.
Reduce mental stress and strain.
Pravasava Raksha at Sree Surya Ayurveda
It includes both external therapy and internal medications .
Abhayanga ( Body massage with medicated oil )
Kizhi
Lepanam with herbal paste
Herbal bath
Dhoopanam
Anjanam
Bandaging the belly
In the case of c-sections the Prasava Raksha will start only after 2-4 weeks, according to the complete healing of wounds.

Thyroid & Related Issues
(hypothyroidism) some of the most common thyroid-related conditions include Hashimoto’s thyroditis, Graves disease , thyroid nodules
Symptoms of hyperthyroidism
Symptoms vary by type of spondyloarthitis .
Experiencing anxiety , irritability and nervousness.
Having trouble sleeping
Losing weight
Having an enlarged thyroid gland or a goiter
Having muscle weakness or tremors
Experiencing irregular menstrual periods or Having your menstrual cycle stop.
Feeling sensitive to heat
Having vision problems or eye irritation
Symptoms of hypothyroidism
Feeling tired
Gaining weight
Experiencing forgetfulness
Having frequent and heavy menstrual periods
Having dry and Coarse hair
Having a hoarse voice
Experiencing an intolerance to cold temperature
Treatments
Herbal formulations
Diet Plan
Exercises
Yoga therapy
Therapeutic treatment

title: Therapeutic Treatments - SREESURYA AYURVEDA

headings.text: 9. Vasti (Kati Vasti, Janu Vasti, Greeva Vasti)

main_content:
Therapeutic Treatments
1. SiroAbhyangam (Head Massage)
Shiro abhyanga involves massaging the head, neck and shoulders with warm herbalised oil to calm and balance your mind and nervous systems.
Relaxes the mind and body
Reduces stress and anxiety
Improves blood circulation to the scalp
Nourishes the scalp and hair follicles
Strengthens hair roots, reducing hair fall
Alleviates headaches and migraines
Enhances mental clarity and concentration
Promotes better sleep quality
2. Steam bath (bashpa swedanam)
An Ayurvedic steam bath is a simple and effective therapy to cleanse the body of toxins. A herbal steam bath involves sweating caused by steam. Such a steam bath can help remove toxins from the body. It is a part of the cleansing therapy done after a massage
Improves circulation
Skin health
Loosens stiff joints
Reduces stress
Workout recovery
Clearing congestion
Relaxation
3. Kizhi(poultice)
It is an Ayurvedic treatment in which warm poultices filled with herbal oils, powder or medical concoctions are applied and massaged over the body. The natural healing herbs are crushed and bundled into muslin cloth to make lizhi/poulthices.
Alleviate doshas, pain and stiffness
Helps the body get rid of wastes and toxins thus leaving the body rejuvenated
Specifically, useful in relieving pain, stiffness and numbness
Prevent ageing
Improve the quality of skin by adding shine and lustre
Reduce body weight
4. Nasyam
Nasyam is a panchakarma treatment for body cleansing used in Ayurvedic medicine. Administration of drugs by the route of nasal cavity is termed as nasya.
Cures headaches, migraines, drynose, nervousness and anxiety
Cures neck stiffness, sinusitis loss of smell
Removes toxins from head, neck, brain, eyes, ear, nose and throat region
Helps in proper blood circulation in the head
5. Dhara
It is one of the major oil therapies in Ayurvedic treatment. In this continual pouring of warm medicated oil or a herbal decoction over the body is done.
Effective in nervous disorders, headaches, migraine, paralysis, insomnia, depression, anxiety etc.
Increase circulation to the brain, soothens the senses and calm the mind
6. Pizhichil
It is a suclation therapy in which the warmed oil is poured all over the body or a specific part of a stipulated period in a specific manner. Throughout this therapy, the body is exposed to streams of luke warm oil with soft massage and rhythmic hand movement. In this process, fixed size linen clothes are dipped in tolerably hot oil or paste and squeezed from a certain height on the patient’s body.
Detoxification of the body
Reducing acne and increasing youthful and radiant skin
Preventing signs of aging
Relieving body pain and increasing rejuvenation
Muscle development and quick healing of fractured bones
Treating diabetes and hypertension
Alleviating arthritis, paralysis, hemiplegia, sexual sidorders, parkinsons disease, nervoise disorders and depression
7. Udvarthanam
Udvarthanam is special therapeutuic deep tissue massage using herbal powders. Udwarthanam means to elevate or to promote. This massage involves upward stroking, where the powder is rubbed forcibly on the body.
Pacifies the aggravated kapha dosha
Reduces the excess fat accumulated in the subcutaneous tissues
Softens and exfoliates dead skin cells, thereby giving a lustrous glow to skin
Detoxification, purification, toning the skin
Eliminates bad body odor
Improves the mobility of joints
Strengthens and tones up the muscles
Refreshes and rejuvenates the body
Take care of conditions due to improper blood supply
Improves the circulation, opens up the body channels (srothas) increasing the basal metabolic rate
Tones up the skin and muscles after the child birth
Removes cellulite and helps in weight reduction
Improves the sense of touch
Reduces blood cholesterol
8. Dhoopanam (Fumigation)
Dhoopanam is an Ayurvedic therapy used for preventive and treatment purposes. In dhoopanam the course powder of the herbs is mixed with honey, ghee etc., liquids. It is put on fire and the fames are increased by fanning. There fames are directed with the help of a cone or a cylinder made of inetals or mud. The particular part of the body is exposed for sufficient amount of time depending on the disease.
Cures the disease of skin
Cures deep sinusitis, diabetic carbuncle, fever
Helpful for treating hemorrhoids
For healing wounds and ulcers
Helps in ear, eyes and teeth diseases
9. Vasti (Kati Vasti, Janu Vasti, Greeva Vasti)
Vasti means to hold. In vasti the warm medicated oil is poured over the affected part (kati, janu, greeva) and retained inside a well sculpted from black gran paste for the required duration (Kati means lower back, Janu means knee joint and greeva means neck).
Cures the disease of skin, arthritis conditions, neck pain, knee pain and low back ache
Reduces stiffness, numbness and muscle spasms
Improve flexibility and range of motion
Helps in relieving sciatic pain
Promotes relaxation and stress relief
Protects cartilages of knee joints from wear and tear

title: Steam bath - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Steam bath (bashpa swedanam)
An Ayurvedic steam bath is a simple and effective therapy to cleanse the body of toxins. A herbal steam bath involves sweating caused by steam. Such a steam bath can help remove toxins from the body. It is a part of the cleansing therapy done after a massage
Improves circulation
Skin health
Loosens stiff joints
Reduces stress
Workout recovery
Clearing congestion
Relaxation

title: Post Maternity Care - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Post Maternity Care
A sacred space for motherhood and selfcare and for your little one.
Our Package
Abhayanga (body massage with medicated Oil)
Kizhi
Lepanam with herbal paste
Herbal bath
Dhoopanam
Anjanam
Bandaging the belly

title: Dhara - SREESURYA AYURVEDA
main_content:
Dhara
It is one of the major oil therapies in Ayurvedic treatment. In this continual pouring of warm medicated oil or a herbal decoction over the body is done.
Effective in nervous disorders, headaches, migraine, paralysis, insomnia, depression, anxiety etc.
Increase circulation to the brain, soothens the senses and calm the mind
